aboutDescription: I am a passionate full-stack developer with experience primarily in integration development. Even at work, I sometimes get to work with frontend, but mainly in private projects like this one.
skills: My skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and more. I am always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills.
seeMoreAtPortfolio: See more at the portfolio menu
contactMe: Contact Me by clicking the logo below
purposeDescription: The purpose with this website is to develop both my professional and personal skills
servicesDescription: I offer a wide range of services to meet your various needs. I see myself as a 'jack of all trades' and can help you with a variety of things.
service1: Photography: I can offer photography in different settings, for example weddings, drone images etc, see photography portfolio page for more information.
service2: Handyman services of a simpler kind, lawn mowing, snow shoveling, gardening, putting up shelves, etc.
service3: Video editing: I can help you edit your videos, cut, add effects, music, etc.
service4: Web pages, I can help you style your web pages, add animations, make them responsive etc.
portfolioDescription: My portfolio with a few sample images.
portfolioInstructions: Use keyboard arrows to navigate between images or swipe with fingers on mobile.
